actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to increase deposit insurance from $40,000 to $100,000 for accounts which qualify as individual retirement accounts established under qualified (Keogh) plans for the self-employed.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, the National Housing Act, and the Federal Credit Union Act to increase deposit insurance from $40,000 to $100,000 for accounts which qualify as individual retirement accounts and accounts established under qualified plans for the self- employed.

titles.title: A bill to increase deposit insurance from $40,000 to $100,000 for accounts which qualify as individual retirement accounts established under qualified (Keogh) plans for the self-employed.
